name: Samurai Tennis II
description:
You are a Samurai animal tennis player. You are the BEST!

Move with WASD, aim&shoot with the MOUSE, slomo with SHIFT.

Get the highest COMBO!

This will become GOTY 2018 or so when it's completed!

Art by Simon Sklett

Music/SFX by Joonas Turner

Code by Roel Ezendam
